attributes.action: Scrap vehicle tracking as part of any policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned have read / appreciate what the prime minister has said in his e-mailed response to the 17 million prople signing a previous petition, but still disagree with the policy of tracking vehicles as a matter of principle.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
